content:
You're welcome! I hope you find the perfect pet bowl brush for Max's bowls. Remember to check the reviews and product descriptions to ensure you get a brush that's gentle on his bowls and effective at removing stuck-on food.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, have a great weekend, and I hope you and Max enjoy your shopping trip!

Don't forget to give Max a belly rub and a treat from me!
